metadata.title: CVE-2024-27030 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:octeontx2-af: Use separate handlers for interruptsFor PF to AF interrupt vector and VF to AF vector sameinterrupt handler is registered which is causing race condition.When two interrupts are raised to two CPUs at same timethen two cores serve same event corrupting the data.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
